pullrequest.title: Access the original parsed version of an SDF document with `Element::OriginalVersion`

content.raw: I can't say why `SDF::SetFilePath` doesn't work that way. Maybe @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} can weigh in. IMO, if the SDFPtr and its root ElementPtr should always have the same `filePath` and `originalVersion`, it would make sense to set them in one place to reduce the chance of setting one and forgetting to set the other.
content.html: I can't say why SDF::SetFilePath doesn't work that way. Maybe @Louise Poubel can weigh in. IMO, if the SDFPtr and its root ElementPtr should always have the same filePath and originalVersion, it would make sense to set them in one place to reduce the chance of setting one and forgetting to set the other.
